input: some number, oops, not 10, might be 10, but I doubt it, maybe some number, and that would be your degrees. So you can have radians written just as a decimal. It's perfectly appropriate to do so, but this is how you do the conversions.
offline_reference: 某个数值，哦，不是10，可能是10，但我表示怀疑，也许是个别的数，那就是你的角度值。因此你可以将弧度直接写成小数形式，这样做完全合适，但这就是你进行换算的方法。
